programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: For Nico Gonzalez, arriving at Manchester City on deadline day in February 2025 was a full circle moment. The son of Francisco Gonzalez, who amassed over 500 appearances for Deportivo La Coruna and went on to be a youth coach at the Etihad from 2016 to 2019, his connection with the Blue side of Manchester was a big factor in his transfer from Porto.
